sentence.Network_en: Trichromatic staining is the staining of tissue samples differentially in three colors.
sentence.Network_cn: 三色染色法是用三种颜色有差异地对组织样品进行染色.

sentence.Network_en: Thus, 54 probe sets ( Pset ) were significantly differentially expressed.
sentence.Network_cn: 因而, 有54个探针设置显著差异表达.

sentence.Network_en: Its very important to differentially diagnose between simple intestinal obstruction and strangulated intestinal obstruction.
sentence.Network_cn: 对单纯性肠梗阻和绞窄性肠梗阻的鉴别诊断非常重要.
